metadata.title: Putting Feelings Into a Moment, Part 3

tracks.text: Silhouettes of Towa, Kei, Rakuro and Rei stand in front of portraits of their SLF characters Pencilgon, Oikatzo, Sunraku, and Psyger-0.
Text, Original Work, Katarina, Ryosuke Fuji. Serialized by Kodansha in Weekly Shounen Magazine
Rakuro wears a VR headset. The ID Shard, a diamond shaped pendant, swings in darkness.
Thirdrema, a western style town, stands at the foot of a hill with a castle at the top.
The sun sets and day turns to night.
Text, Shangri-La Frontier
Rakuro turns into Sunraku, who wields twin marsh daggers
Red water gurgles
Pencilgon descends to the ground and strikes with a spear
Katzo draws a red fist and black fist together, and her fists burst crimson.
Emul, Elke, Vash, Bilac, and Peitz walk along the Rabbituza palace verandah.
Psyger-0 and Psyger-100 stand back to back in a board room
Setsuna walks. Beyond her is the gnarled tree, high cliffs, and full moon.
Wethermon, a metal samurai, stares at us with glowing eyes. Fire licks his arms, shoulders, and stomach.
Kirin, a metal horse, rears in front of a red moon
A golden Reward Scales shift
Sunraku holds a two handed long sword and strikes at shadowy ghouls that surround him in a misty, purple forest.
Dozens of shadowy figures stand on outcroppings. Their eyes glow red.
Pencilgon swings a spear in mist
A headless horse and horseman gallop. She strikes
Katzo does a flying back flip over skeletal monsters
Wethermon draws a sword. The moon reflects in a muddy puddle. A drop splashes. Psyger-0 holds a sword, her long red plume blowing in the wind.
In a library, a girl with long pink braids and wide, green eyes smiles widely and reaches out a hand.
The Rebirth Tearjewel lands on Sunraku's abs and glows
Sunraku grips a curved dagger. Wearing a beetle helmet and diamond shaped pendant, he runs forward. Katzo with red fists and Pencilgon with a spear run with him.
In slow motion, they approach the samurai. The world turns red.
The blue, jeweled vase cracks over Wethermon, coating him in glowing, turquoise liquid. Steam pours from cracks. He screams.
Text, 17, Putting Feelings into a Moment, Part 3
Blue flire burns through cracks.
He stands taller. A sakura petal touches the flames and crumbles to ash.
Kirin hangs its head. It's face splits in half and pulls apart, breaking Katzo's whip ties.
Kirin's front leg retreat into its body, replaced by arms and hands.
Its back horse legs grow thicker and shorter.
The body reconfigures itself.
Kirin has transformered into a walking golem with cable hair out of its head.
Golem Kirin swings a fist and punches at Katzo, who runs.
He stares forward, determined.
She furrows her brow. She stands up straight, relaxes her face, and smiles.
The flaming samurai raises his sword.
Wind slash. Dodge.
Sunraku strikes. Wethermon moves his head. The blade chips at the armor, which glitters red.
Head equipment change, Spiked BattleHelm 4a
He switches his marsh daggers for his moon blades.
Wethermon raises his sword
Sunraku uses his beetle horned helmet to parry the sword.
He strikes with white blade. Critical.
Wethermon slashes. The shockwave knocks Sunraku back.
Wethermon points the sword forward and runs.
Sunraku makes a glowing X in the air.
A ripple appears behind Wethermon, and a glowing X strikes from it
Wethermon strikes at the air behind him.
Wethermon stumbles
Wethermon shakes. Shockwaves ripple from his back as crits stack up
He drops to his knees.
Pencilgon glances over in concern.
Katzo runs, dodging Kirin's feet.
A laser cannon fires from Kirin's hand
The ground explodes in blue. Katzo rides the shockwave.
Missiles
Katzo equips a whip
She whips Kirin's hand. Kirin swings her around like a yoyo
and smashes her into the ground.
Her HP drops to 0
She throws Divine LifeSalve.
Kirin turns towards Pencilgon
Katzo kips up
Katzo eats one of the ominous, black balls
Her pupils shrink
Level 49
Her hand glows gold, then her spear.
Pencilgon HP 400 + boosts
Kirin's hand reaches the ground
Kirin aims his laser cannon at Pencilgon
Pencilgon rides the shockwave back
missing an arm.
Pencilgon frowns, then smiles.
Sunraku parries a strike from Wethermon.
He strikes, critical. Wethermon slashes. Dodge.
Wethermon stands up straight, blue fire rising from his helmet.
HP 9
Wethermon eyes the ID shard
Wethermon didn't move
Sunraku jumps back
Wethermon stares
Sunraku take a stance, jostling the ID shard.
He tosses away an arm bracer.
His body becomes engulfed in black flames
He leaps to Sunraku
Hand outstretched
Sunraku kicks the hand away
Wethermon digs his sword in the ground
The ground cracks. Lava shoots out, forming a snake that spirals above and lunges to Sunraku
He runs
Lava snake snaps. He dodges. Several more lava snakes gather in the air above him
They form together, generating a dark, spiraling cloud.
Ash spins. Tendrils of smoke descend from the cloud. 3 lava snakes fly after Sunraku
He runs. jump from snake, side step snake, jump over snake, fall and summersault recover under snake,
We race across the ashen ground, tendrils of smoke crashing around us, our swords in hand. We side step a lava snake.
Lightning strikes around him.
Sunraku looks at item list. Wethermon raises a sword.
A puddle of black ink forms under his feet and crawls up his legs.
He rips a gash in reality and calls forth the sun.
He parries. His helmet horn breaks in half.
The gash slices through Sunraku and across the land
Katzo and Pencilgon turn
Sunraku drops to his knees, a bleeding gash down his torso
His belt disappears
Katzo holds a Tearjewel
Wethermon turns away
Sunraku looks up at a Tearjewel
Text, 22, The day starts early for a girl in love
Text, Why are you up so early?
How did you find that out?
What are you doing?
